Class ItemShrestha

java.lang.Object
ItemShrestha
public class ItemShrestha extends Object
Author:
Arya Shrestha
Prog 9
Due Date and Time: 4/3/2025 before 9:00 AM
Represents an individual shopping item with name, quantity and price. Provides methods to access and modify item properties and format output.
Certification of Authenticity:
I certify that this class is entirely my own work.

  • Constructor Details

    • ItemShrestha

      public ItemShrestha()
      Constructs a new ItemShrestha with default values. The name is set to empty string, quantity to 0, and price to 0.0.

    • ItemShrestha

      public ItemShrestha(String newName, int newQuantity, double newPrice)
      Constructs a new full ItemShrestha with specified values.
      Parameters:
      newName - the name of the item
      newQuantity - the quantity of the item
      newPrice - the price per unit of the item

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the item. The format is: "name, quantity: x, price: $y.yy each"
      Overrides:
